mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Home of Washington Illustrated. Mansion, East Front, from S. E.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of east front of the Mansion. Part of a set of 45 views possibly 'No. 17. or No. 18. Mansion, East Front, from S. E.' from list of views on the reverse. View shows Mansion from the southeast lawn, the porch and balustrade have been repaired, 1874-1875. Mounted on cream board. Photographed by Gardner, 921 Penna. Avenue, Washington, D. C. for the Ladies' Mount Vernon Association. Typically, there is a line or dash marked next to the specific numbered view on the printed list on the reverse. In this case, there is no indicator.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
